TopicTitle: PSP games to recomend to a 11 year old?

Articles.Content:
hi,

does anyone have any PSP games they can recommend to a eleven year old, who is an absolute KSP fan?

thanks,

martin

Monster hunter? Any of the series on the PSP. The first thing I can think of when it comes to PSP games... hmm.

Patapon, maybe? another fun classic.

Little Big Planet is fun. 

Star Wars Battlefront if you like Star Wars and shooters.

Ratchet and Clank.

Half-Minute Hero (fun and hilarious RPG)
